text: This isnâ€™t possible indeed. You could replace the rich text for a custom text input with a choice field with only a h1, h2, h3 as option.
<@UEQQ2AGEP> Its a wrong structure, I would suggest you to look for documentation or create a Drag and drop page and copy all section's HubL using "?developerMode=true". !

Is it ok ask for source for documentation or some sort of repo?

I copied the the drag and drop hubl, Drag area does work but the modules are not attached by default in page?
So, when copying HubL from DeveloperMode, it only allows you to copy custom modules from the same theme.
And `|int` if you want a number
it worked perfectly, thank you both
